parts: Please create a poster incorporating the following images. The theme will be summer camp and the text will read “Camper Russ”

dalle.prompt: Create a summer camp themed poster featuring an anthropomorphic sun character, similar to the one shown in the reference image, but with a different design, wearing a hat like the one worn by the man in the second reference image. The sun character should have a friendly and welcoming expression, holding a book in one hand and a drink can in the other, seated casually outdoors with a background of trees and a camp setting. Include the text 'Camper Russ' in a playful, camp-style font at the top of the poster. The overall feel should be cheerful and inviting, suitable for a summer camp promotion.
